R

randomDirection() - Method in enum generation.CardinalDirection
Gives a random direction.
RangeSet - Class in gui
Class stores a set of ranges, i.e., intervals.
RangeSet() - Constructor for class gui.RangeSet
Constructor
redraw(Graphics, Constants.StateGUI, int, int, int, int, int, int, RangeSet, int) - Method in class gui.MazeView
 
redrawGenerating(MazePanel) - Method in class gui.MazeView
Draws the generating screen, screen content is hard coded
redrawTitle(MazePanel, String) - Method in class gui.MazeView
Draws the title screen, screen content is hard coded
remove(int, int) - Method in class gui.RangeSet
Removes interval [lb,ub] from existing set such that none of its elements intersects with it anymore.
reproduceMaze() - Method in class generation.MazeFactoryTest
Makes sure than when deterministic is true, two consecutive mazes produced with the exact same settings are identical.
resetEnergyConsumption() - Method in class gui.ManualDriver
Used by controller to reset total energy consumed to 0.
resetOdometer() - Method in class gui.BasicRobot
 
resetOdometer() - Method in interface gui.Robot
Resets the odomoter counter to zero.
resetRobot() - Method in class gui.BasicRobotTest
Resets the robot to the starting position of the maze, and refills its battery back to full.
resetRobot() - Method in class gui.ManualDriverTest
Resets the driver's robot back to the starting position, and resets its odometer and battery level.
Robot - Interface in gui
This interface specifies methods to operate a robot that is inside a maze at a particular location and looking in a particular direction.
Robot.Direction - Enum in gui
Describes all possible directions from the point of view of the robot, i.e., relative to its current forward position.
Robot.Turn - Enum in gui
Describes all possible turns that a robot can do when it rotates on the spot.
RobotDriver - Interface in gui
This interface specifies a robot driver that operates a robot to escape from a given maze.
robotInRoom() - Method in class gui.BasicRobotTest
Tests the .isInsideRoom method.
robotNotInRoom() - Method in class gui.BasicRobotTest
Tests the .isInsideRoom method.
robotOutOfEnergy() - Method in class gui.BasicRobot
Used by winning screen to tell if the robot ran out of energy and cannot complete the maze.
rotate(Robot.Turn) - Method in class gui.BasicRobot
 
rotate(Robot.Turn) - Method in interface gui.Robot
Turn robot on the spot for amount of degrees.
rotateChangesEnergy() - Method in class gui.BasicRobotTest
Tests that a robot's battery level is actually changed after a rotate operation.
rotateClockwise() - Method in enum generation.CardinalDirection
Gives the direction that results from a 90 degree clockwise rotation applied to the current direction.
rotateCounterClockwise() - Method in enum generation.CardinalDirection
Gives the direction that results from a 90 degree counterclockwise rotation applied to the current direction.
rotateWithoutEnoughEnergy() - Method in class gui.BasicRobotTest
Tests that a robot without enough energy to rotate that tries to rotate does not successfully do so.
run() - Method in class generation.MazeBuilder
Main method to run construction of a new maze in a thread of its own.
